item.title: Running .NET 2 Runtime applications under the .NET 4 Runtime
item.description: In some situations, you might want to run a .NET 2 Runtime application (.NET 2, 3.0, 3.5 SP1 etc) under the .NET 4 Runtime – without recompiling.
